content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":255592,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達、そっちのけで３人の会話（レキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー）","translatedEnglishLine":"While ignoring Rance and the others, a conversation among three people (Lexington, Atlanta, Juno)."},{"lineNumber":255593,"originalJapaneseLine":"また俺達で暴れようとか、こんな傷すぐに回復するとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Talks about causing chaos again, and about how quickly this kind of wound heals."},{"lineNumber":255594,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、俺様を無視するな、ぐさっ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, don't ignore me! *stab*"},{"lineNumber":255595,"originalJapaneseLine":"３人で再会を喜び夢中になっていたレキシントンを後ろから刺す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Stabs Lexington from behind, who was joyfully reunited and absorbed with the three of them."},{"lineNumber":255596,"originalJapaneseLine":"女なら抱いて可愛がって仲間にしてやるつもりだったが","translatedEnglishLine":"I intended to embrace and cherish her as a companion if she was a woman,"},{"lineNumber":255597,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんか、いきなり男ぽくなった、いや、見た目が女だけで男と分かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"But suddenly she seemed manly—no, though she looks like a woman, I realized she was a man."},{"lineNumber":255598,"originalJapaneseLine":"よって容赦しない、ぐりぐり。","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, no mercy, *pressing stubbornly*."},{"lineNumber":255599,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスは、そうそうーやっちゃえーと","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says, yeah, go ahead and do it!"},{"lineNumber":255600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":255601,"originalJapaneseLine":"おのれーだめだ・・まだ力が・・とかうめきながら死んでいくレキシントン","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington groans and dies saying, 'Damn... no... still have strength...'"},{"lineNumber":255602,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには魔血魂だけが残った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Only the Demon Blood Soul remained there."},{"lineNumber":255603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":255604,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタとジュノーが拾おうとしたが","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon Blood Soul rolled over, and Atlanta and Juno tried to pick it up,"},{"lineNumber":255605,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Rance picked it up... Gahahahaha, I won't give it to you."},{"lineNumber":255606,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら、先程の魔人がお前達の主人だったのだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems that the demon you saw earlier was your master."},{"lineNumber":255607,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、そうか、主人を助けたいよな、うむ忠義だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, I see, you want to help your master. Hmm, that’s loyalty."},{"lineNumber":255608,"originalJapaneseLine":"にゃり","translatedEnglishLine":"*smirk*"},{"lineNumber":255609,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、俺の言う事をなんでも聞いてもらおう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, you will do whatever I say."},{"lineNumber":255610,"originalJapaneseLine":"刃向かうとこの魔血魂、消しちゃうぞ。くくくく","translatedEnglishLine":"If you resist, I'll erase this Demon Blood Soul. Kukukuku."},{"lineNumber":255611,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっぱいもみながら勝ち誇るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance triumphantly groping breasts."},{"lineNumber":255612,"originalJapaneseLine":"アトランタ、ジュノーは服従する","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta and Juno submit."},{"lineNumber":255613,"originalJapaneseLine":"アトランタ、お前は俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta, you will become my flesh slave."},{"lineNumber":255614,"originalJapaneseLine":"これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, you shall remain completely naked."},{"lineNumber":255615,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha."},{"lineNumber":255616,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ゲームクリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Game Clear>"},{"lineNumber":255617,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図：リーザス１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Using Map: Leesass 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation."},{"lineNumber":255618,"originalJapaneseLine":"均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are two types: a balanced state and a critical state near destruction."},{"lineNumber":255619,"originalJapaneseLine":"状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the situation changes significantly, please check conditions and insert two types of texts."},{"lineNumber":255620,"originalJapaneseLine":"ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please explain by narration or by inserting character lines here and there."},{"lineNumber":255621,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s more important that the user understands rather than it being an explanation to Rance."},{"lineNumber":255622,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバを出す場合は条件付きで頼みます","translatedEnglishLine":"If Cordoba appears, please make it conditional."},{"lineNumber":255623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":255624,"originalJapaneseLine":"確認(\"リーザスピンチ\")==1","translatedEnglishLine":"Check(\"LeesassPinch\")==1"},{"lineNumber":255625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army vastly outnumbers and the possibility of extinction is high."},{"lineNumber":255626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ヨシフ率いる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others have exterminated demons coming this way, but under the command of Great Demon General Yosif,"},{"lineNumber":255627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍はリーザス軍を徐々に追い詰めていた","translatedEnglishLine":"A massive army numbering in the tens of thousands was gradually cornering the Leesass forces."},{"lineNumber":255628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア、マリス　　ダーリンがかんばったのだからリア達もがんばらないと、まだ負けてない","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris: Since darling did his best, we must also do our best. We're not defeated yet."},{"lineNumber":255629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バレス　　　　　やばいのお、いつまで持たせる事が出来る事やら","translatedEnglishLine":"Baresu: This is bad... I wonder how long we can hold out."},{"lineNumber":255630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック　　　傷尽きならがも連日の出動","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick: Despite being wounded, deploying day after day."},{"lineNumber":255631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":255632,"originalJapaneseLine":"確認(\"リーザスピンチ\")==0","translatedEnglishLine":"Check(\"LeesassPinch\")==0"},{"lineNumber":255633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している","translatedEnglishLine":"The forces are balanced, with a slight advantage on one side."},{"lineNumber":255634,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック、バレスなどの活躍　　魔軍を撃退し徐々に減らしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to the efforts of Rick, Baresu, and others, the demon army is being repelled and steadily reduced."},{"lineNumber":255635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア、マリス　　前線からの勝利報告です。やったわね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris: This is a victory report from the front lines. We did it."},{"lineNumber":255636,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、まだまだ油断は出来ないわ","translatedEnglishLine":"But we still can't let our guard down."},{"lineNumber":255637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バレス、魔人がいなくなり我々が対等に戦える相手のみになったのは助かるな","translatedEnglishLine":"Baresu: Without the demons, it's a relief that we're now facing only opponents we can fight equally."},{"lineNumber":255638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　工夫し努力すれば勝ちは見えてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"With ingenuity and effort, victory will come into view."},{"lineNumber":255639,"originalJapaneseLine":"　プリティリア、スケールを一気に奪い返しましょうと誰かが言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Pretria: Someone said we should recapture the Scale at once,"},{"lineNumber":255640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだだ、敵を削り弱らせ、我が軍も十分に補給と準備をして作戦に挑まねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"Not yet. We must wear down and weaken the enemy, and our forces must be properly supplied and prepared before challenging the operation."},{"lineNumber":255641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反撃のチャンスはそう多く無い１回で決めねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"There aren’t many chances for a counterattack; we must decide it in one shot."},{"lineNumber":255642,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、敵の総大将が後ろにひっこんでいるのが困った事だな、もう少し前に来て欲しいのだが","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it’s troublesome that the enemy’s general is staying in the rear; I want him to come a bit forward."},{"lineNumber":255643,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Leesass Castle."},{"lineNumber":255644,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has arrived."},{"lineNumber":255645,"originalJapaneseLine":"と言う状態よ、今の戦況は","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the situation. This is the current state of the battle."},{"lineNumber":255646,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ、ま、ランス城の総統司令部でだいたい聞いてきたから分かっているけどな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, well, I heard the general summary at Rance Castle's headquarters, so I understand."},{"lineNumber":255647,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し余裕があるのかじゃれあう","translatedEnglishLine":"They play around a bit, maybe because they have some breathing room."},{"lineNumber":255648,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア、マリス、チルディ（今回のメインゲスト）","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris, and Childi (this time’s main guests)."},{"lineNumber":255649,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックとレイラが仲良いシーンを見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Shows a scene where Rick and Leila are getting along well."},{"lineNumber":255650,"originalJapaneseLine":"メモ：ランスに何かしてもらわないといけないという状況では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Note: This isn't a situation where Rance has to do something."},{"lineNumber":255651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　あの魔人達を倒してもらったのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"Because he already defeated those demons."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達、そっちのけで３人の会話（レキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While ignoring Rance and the others, a conversation among three people (Lexington, Atlanta, Juno).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また俺達で暴れようとか、こんな傷すぐに回復するとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talks about causing chaos again, and about how quickly this kind of wound heals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、俺様を無視するな、ぐさっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don't ignore me! *stab*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人で再会を喜び夢中になっていたレキシントンを後ろから刺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stabs Lexington from behind, who was joyfully reunited and absorbed with the three of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女なら抱いて可愛がって仲間にしてやるつもりだったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intended to embrace and cherish her as a companion if she was a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、いきなり男ぽくなった、いや、見た目が女だけで男と分かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But suddenly she seemed manly—no, though she looks like a woman, I realized she was a man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よって容赦しない、ぐりぐり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, no mercy, *pressing stubbornly*.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスは、そうそうーやっちゃえーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, yeah, go ahead and do it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おのれーだめだ・・まだ力が・・とかうめきながら死んでいくレキシントン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington groans and dies saying, 'Damn... no... still have strength...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには魔血魂だけが残った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the Demon Blood Soul remained there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタとジュノーが拾おうとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Blood Soul rolled over, and Atlanta and Juno tried to pick it up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Rance picked it up... Gahahahaha, I won't give it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、先程の魔人がお前達の主人だったのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that the demon you saw earlier was your master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、そうか、主人を助けたいよな、うむ忠義だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see, you want to help your master. Hmm, that’s loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にゃり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *smirk*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、俺の言う事をなんでも聞いてもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, you will do whatever I say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刃向かうとこの魔血魂、消しちゃうぞ。くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you resist, I'll erase this Demon Blood Soul. Kukukuku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいもみながら勝ち誇るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance triumphantly groping breasts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、ジュノーは服従する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta and Juno submit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、お前は俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta, you will become my flesh slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall remain completely naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゲームクリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Game Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using Map: Leesass 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two types: a balanced state and a critical state near destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the situation changes significantly, please check conditions and insert two types of texts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please explain by narration or by inserting character lines here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s more important that the user understands rather than it being an explanation to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバを出す場合は条件付きで頼みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Cordoba appears, please make it conditional.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("リーザスピンチ")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check("LeesassPinch")==1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army vastly outnumbers and the possibility of extinction is high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ヨシフ率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have exterminated demons coming this way, but under the command of Great Demon General Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍はリーザス軍を徐々に追い詰めていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A massive army numbering in the tens of thousands was gradually cornering the Leesass forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス　　ダーリンがかんばったのだからリア達もがんばらないと、まだ負けてない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris: Since darling did his best, we must also do our best. We're not defeated yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス　　　　　やばいのお、いつまで持たせる事が出来る事やら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu: This is bad... I wonder how long we can hold out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック　　　傷尽きならがも連日の出動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick: Despite being wounded, deploying day after day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("リーザスピンチ")==0
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check("LeesassPinch")==0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces are balanced, with a slight advantage on one side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック、バレスなどの活躍　　魔軍を撃退し徐々に減らしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the efforts of Rick, Baresu, and others, the demon army is being repelled and steadily reduced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス　　前線からの勝利報告です。やったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris: This is a victory report from the front lines. We did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、まだまだ油断は出来ないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we still can't let our guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、魔人がいなくなり我々が対等に戦える相手のみになったのは助かるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu: Without the demons, it's a relief that we're now facing only opponents we can fight equally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工夫し努力すれば勝ちは見えてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ingenuity and effort, victory will come into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリティリア、スケールを一気に奪い返しましょうと誰かが言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pretria: Someone said we should recapture the Scale at once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだだ、敵を削り弱らせ、我が軍も十分に補給と準備をして作戦に挑まねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet. We must wear down and weaken the enemy, and our forces must be properly supplied and prepared before challenging the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反撃のチャンスはそう多く無い１回で決めねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There aren’t many chances for a counterattack; we must decide it in one shot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、敵の総大将が後ろにひっこんでいるのが困った事だな、もう少し前に来て欲しいのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it’s troublesome that the enemy’s general is staying in the rear; I want him to come a bit forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesass Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言う状態よ、今の戦況は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the situation. This is the current state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、ま、ランス城の総統司令部でだいたい聞いてきたから分かっているけどな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, well, I heard the general summary at Rance Castle's headquarters, so I understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し余裕があるのかじゃれあう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They play around a bit, maybe because they have some breathing room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、チルディ（今回のメインゲスト）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris, and Childi (this time’s main guests).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックとレイラが仲良いシーンを見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shows a scene where Rick and Leila are getting along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ：ランスに何かしてもらわないといけないという状況では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: This isn't a situation where Rance has to do something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔人達を倒してもらったのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he already defeated those demons.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I wonder how long we can hold out."},{"lineNumber":255630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック　　　傷尽きならがも連日の出動","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick: Despite being wounded, deploying day after day."},{"lineNumber":255631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":255632,"originalJapaneseLine":"確認(\"リーザスピンチ\")==0","translatedEnglishLine":"Check(\"LeesassPinch\")==0"},{"lineNumber":255633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している","translatedEnglishLine":"The forces are balanced, with a slight advantage on one side."},{"lineNumber":255634,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック、バレスなどの活躍　　魔軍を撃退し徐々に減らしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to the efforts of Rick, Baresu, and others, the demon army is being repelled and steadily reduced."},{"lineNumber":255635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア、マリス　　前線からの勝利報告です。やったわね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris: This is a victory report from the front lines. We must wear down and weaken the enemy, and our forces must be properly supplied and prepared before challenging the operation."},{"lineNumber":255641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反撃のチャンスはそう多く無い１回で決めねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"There aren’t many chances for a counterattack; we must decide it in one shot."},{"lineNumber":255642,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、敵の総大将が後ろにひっこんでいるのが困った事だな、もう少し前に来て欲しいのだが","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it’s troublesome that the enemy’s general is staying in the rear; I want him to come a bit forward."},{"lineNumber":255643,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Leesass Castle."},{"lineNumber":255644,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has arrived."},{"lineNumber":255645,"originalJapaneseLine":"と言う状態よ、今の戦況は","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the situation. This is the current state of the battle."},{"lineNumber":255646,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ、ま、ランス城の総統司令部でだいたい聞いてきたから分かっているけどな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, well, I heard the general summary at Rance Castle's headquarters, so I understand."},{"lineNumber":255647,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し余裕があるのかじゃれあう","translatedEnglishLine":"They play around a bit, maybe because they have some breathing room."},{"lineNumber":255648,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア、マリス、チルディ（今回のメインゲスト）","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Maris, and Childi (this time’s main guests)."},{"lineNumber":255649,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックとレイラが仲良いシーンを見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Shows a scene where Rick and Leila are getting along well."},{"lineNumber":255650,"originalJapaneseLine":"メモ：ランスに何かしてもらわないといけないという状況では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Note: This isn't a situation where Rance has to do something."},{"lineNumber":255651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　あの魔人達を倒してもらったのだから","translatedEnglishLine":"Because he already defeated those demons."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達、そっちのけで３人の会話（レキシントン、アトランタ、ジュノー）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While ignoring Rance and the others, a conversation among three people (Lexington, Atlanta, Juno).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また俺達で暴れようとか、こんな傷すぐに回復するとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talks about causing chaos again, and about how quickly this kind of wound heals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、俺様を無視するな、ぐさっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don't ignore me! *stab*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人で再会を喜び夢中になっていたレキシントンを後ろから刺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stabs Lexington from behind, who was joyfully reunited and absorbed with the three of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女なら抱いて可愛がって仲間にしてやるつもりだったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intended to embrace and cherish her as a companion if she was a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか、いきなり男ぽくなった、いや、見た目が女だけで男と分かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But suddenly she seemed manly—no, though she looks like a woman, I realized she was a man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よって容赦しない、ぐりぐり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, no mercy, *pressing stubbornly*.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスは、そうそうーやっちゃえーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, yeah, go ahead and do it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おのれーだめだ・・まだ力が・・とかうめきながら死んでいくレキシントン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington groans and dies saying, 'Damn... no... still have strength...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには魔血魂だけが残った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the Demon Blood Soul remained there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタとジュノーが拾おうとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Blood Soul rolled over, and Atlanta and Juno tried to pick it up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Rance picked it up... Gahahahaha, I won't give it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、先程の魔人がお前達の主人だったのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that the demon you saw earlier was your master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、そうか、主人を助けたいよな、うむ忠義だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see, you want to help your master. Hmm, that’s loyalty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にゃり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *smirk*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、俺の言う事をなんでも聞いてもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, you will do whatever I say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刃向かうとこの魔血魂、消しちゃうぞ。くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you resist, I'll erase this Demon Blood Soul. Kukukuku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいもみながら勝ち誇るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance triumphantly groping breasts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、ジュノーは服従する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta and Juno submit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、お前は俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta, you will become my flesh slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall remain completely naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゲームクリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Game Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using Map: Leesass 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two types: a balanced state and a critical state near destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the situation changes significantly, please check conditions and insert two types of texts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please explain by narration or by inserting character lines here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s more important that the user understands rather than it being an explanation to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバを出す場合は条件付きで頼みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Cordoba appears, please make it conditional.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("リーザスピンチ")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check("LeesassPinch")==1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army vastly outnumbers and the possibility of extinction is high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ヨシフ率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others have exterminated demons coming this way, but under the command of Great Demon General Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍はリーザス軍を徐々に追い詰めていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A massive army numbering in the tens of thousands was gradually cornering the Leesass forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス　　ダーリンがかんばったのだからリア達もがんばらないと、まだ負けてない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris: Since darling did his best, we must also do our best. We're not defeated yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス　　　　　やばいのお、いつまで持たせる事が出来る事やら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu: This is bad... I wonder how long we can hold out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック　　　傷尽きならがも連日の出動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick: Despite being wounded, deploying day after day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("リーザスピンチ")==0
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check("LeesassPinch")==0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces are balanced, with a slight advantage on one side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック、バレスなどの活躍　　魔軍を撃退し徐々に減らしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the efforts of Rick, Baresu, and others, the demon army is being repelled and steadily reduced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス　　前線からの勝利報告です。やったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris: This is a victory report from the front lines. We did it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、まだまだ油断は出来ないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we still can't let our guard down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、魔人がいなくなり我々が対等に戦える相手のみになったのは助かるな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu: Without the demons, it's a relief that we're now facing only opponents we can fight equally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工夫し努力すれば勝ちは見えてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With ingenuity and effort, victory will come into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリティリア、スケールを一気に奪い返しましょうと誰かが言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pretria: Someone said we should recapture the Scale at once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだだ、敵を削り弱らせ、我が軍も十分に補給と準備をして作戦に挑まねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet. We must wear down and weaken the enemy, and our forces must be properly supplied and prepared before challenging the operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反撃のチャンスはそう多く無い１回で決めねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There aren’t many chances for a counterattack; we must decide it in one shot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、敵の総大将が後ろにひっこんでいるのが困った事だな、もう少し前に来て欲しいのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it’s troublesome that the enemy’s general is staying in the rear; I want him to come a bit forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesass Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言う状態よ、今の戦況は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the situation. This is the current state of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、ま、ランス城の総統司令部でだいたい聞いてきたから分かっているけどな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, well, I heard the general summary at Rance Castle's headquarters, so I understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し余裕があるのかじゃれあう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They play around a bit, maybe because they have some breathing room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリス、チルディ（今回のメインゲスト）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Maris, and Childi (this time’s main guests).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックとレイラが仲良いシーンを見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shows a scene where Rick and Leila are getting along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ：ランスに何かしてもらわないといけないという状況では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: This isn't a situation where Rance has to do something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔人達を倒してもらったのだから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he already defeated those demons.
